location.name: [Required] Assign any location name
location.number: [Required] Please make sure to follow the number format E.164 e.g: +12345678911

sipTrunk.SipServers: [Required] The Sip Servers or Termination URI is unique within user's Genesys Cloud Organization's region. The termination URI will be used by the 3rd party PBX or Carrier to direct SIP traffic to Genesys Cloud
sipTrunk.realm: Realm must match the username and password to be sent
sipTrunk.password: Password to send when trunk is challenged for the realm
sipTrunk.address: [Required] Specific overriding caller ID adddress to use as the outgoing origination address. May be a URI or raw phone number
sipTrunk.callingName: Specific overriding caller ID name to use as the outgoing origination address. May be a URI or raw phone number
sipTrunk.userName: User name to send when trunk is challenged for the realm
sipTrunk.instance: [Required] BYOC Cloud public SIP IP addresses
